entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Flurries and local snow squalls overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or snow squalls. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
